sentence: Instead, she posted the CNN reporter’s business card on her Facebook page, writing, “I will not be intimidated.” In Arizona, another Trump-endorsed candidate, Mark Finchem, is also running for secretary of state.
author: Anna-Maja Rappard
title: 2020 sore losers look to run the 2024 vote

sentence: Recipients also include a slate of Arizona candidates -- gubernatorial hopeful Kari Lake, Senate candidate Wendy Rogers and secretary of state contender Mark Finchem -- who have lied about voter fraud in the state and misrepresented the findings of a partisan review of the 2020 results commissioned by state Senate Republicans.
author: Eric Bradner
title: Trump's PAC gave $1 million to Meadows' non-profit weeks after House formed January 6 committee

sentence: Recipients also include a slate of Arizona candidates — gubernatorial hopeful Kari Lake, Senate candidate Wendy Rogers and secretary of state contender Mark Finchem — who have lied about voter fraud in the state and misrepresented the findings of a partisan review of the 2020 results commissioned by state Senate Republicans.
author: Cnn Com
title: After Jan. 6 panel formed, Trump PAC gave to Meadows’ org.

sentence: In Arizona, Trump is backing state Rep. Mark Finchem for Secretary of State.

title: Georgia GOP is ‘legislating based on conspiracy theories and lies’: Washington Post editorial board
